select rownum, sabang_id, sabang_name, sabang_price, sabang_saleprice, sabang_buycount, sabang_viewcount, sabang_imgoname, sabang_imgsname, sabang_imgtype, sabang_state from ( select sabang_id, sabang_name, sabang_price, sabang_saleprice, sabang_buycount, sabang_viewcount, sabang_imgoname, sabang_imgsname, sabang_imgtype, sabang_state from sabang order by sabang_buycount desc ) where rownum <= 3

select rownum, sabang_id, sabang_name, sabang_price, sabang_saleprice, sabang_buycount, sabang_viewcount, sabang_imgoname, sabang_imgsname, sabang_imgtype, sabang_state from ( select sabang_id, sabang_name, sabang_price, sabang_saleprice, sabang_buycount, sabang_viewcount, sabang_imgoname, sabang_imgsname, sabang_imgtype, sabang_state from sabang where sabang_saleprice <= #{sabang_saleprice} order by sabang_buycount desc ) where rownum <= 6
